---
title: "Untitled"
output: pdf_document
---

```{r setup, echo=F, message=F, warning=F}

table3 <- read.csv("table3.csv", header = T)
table3 <- table3[,-1]
library(kableExtra)


kable(table3, "latex", align = "l", booktabs = T, linesep="")%>%
  kable_styling(latex_options = "scale_down") %>%
  add_header_above(c(" " = 2, "Full items" = 4, "5 items" = 4))
```
